p: Thirty clinical MRSA isolates were collected from King Abdulaziz Specialist Hospital, Taif, Saudi Arabia. The isolates were obtained from infection sites: surgical site infection (SSI, n = 4), skin and soft tissue (SST, n = 12), blood ( n = 1), nasal ( n = 8) and burn ( n = 5). The distribution of isolates based on the type of specimen is presented in Figure 1.
